mapper.select: select count(case when task_type_id=1 then 1 end) as storiesCount, count(case when task_type_id=2 then 1 end) as todoCount, count(case when task_type_id=3 then 1 end) as doingCount, count(case when task_type_id=4 then 1 end) as doneCount, count(*) as totalCount from task_ex where project_id=#{project_id}

select responsibility,name, project_id, count(case when task_type_id=1 then 1 end) as storiesCount, count(case when task_type_id=2 then 1 end) as todoCount, count(case when task_type_id=3 then 1 end) as doingCount, count(case when task_type_id=4 then 1 end) as doneCount, count(*) as totalCount from task_ex where project_id=#{project_id} group by responsibility,name,project_id order by name
select responsibility, name, task_content, project_id from task_ex where project_id = #{project_id} and responsibility = #{responsibility}

select project_id, project_title, pm_id, project_status_id, To_CHAR(project_start_date,'YYYY-MM-DD') as project_start_date, TO_CHAR(project_end_date,'YYYY-MM-DD') as project_end_date from project_ex order by project_id asc
